about.title: Who is MH Business?
about.subtitle: Your dedicated partner for entrepreneurial success.
about.text: MH Business was born from the desire to support entrepreneurs in bringing their projects to life. Whether you're just starting out or in a growth phase, I provide the tools and support you need to reach your goals. My approach is personalized, pragmatic, and results-driven.

services.title: Key Services
services.subtitle: A full range of services to boost your business.

web.title: Website Creation
web.desc: Design and development of modern, high-performance, SEO-optimized websites using Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS.

visual.title: Visual Identity & Printing
visual.desc: Logo creation, brand guidelines, and print management for your materials (business cards, flyers, signs).

admin.title: Administrative & Accounting Support
admin.desc: Assistance with administrative organization, process implementation, and connecting with accounting experts.

approach.title: Personalized Approach:
approach.desc: Every support is unique, tailored to your specific needs and your business reality.

expertise.title: Broad Expertise:
expertise.desc: Benefit from a wide range of skills, from web development to strategic consulting.

network.title: Trusted Network:
network.desc: Access a network of trusted partners for services I don't handle directly.

serenity.title: Time-Saving and Peace of Mind:
serenity.desc: Delegate complex tasks and focus on your core business.

testimonials.title: What my clients say
testimonials.subtitle: Client satisfaction is my greatest pride.

1.quote: Thanks to MH Business for being available and supportive in designing my marketing strategy, client targeting, and a working price offer.
1.author: Hassan Vural
1.title: HV | Conseil & gestion

2.quote: With MH Business’s support, managing my business admin has finally become smooth. A true relief!
2.author: Marc L.
2.title: Manager, 'Solutions BTP'

3.quote: MH Business’s strategic advice was key in launching my brand. Highly recommended!
3.author: Clara V.
3.title: Creator, 'Atelier Clara'

hero.title: “MH Business, when strategy turns into action”

calltoaction.p: Whether it's for a website, a strong visual identity, or better management, MH Business is here for you.
